title: Grand Canyon National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News                Grand Canyon National Park makes every effort to keep you informed about news events, special events, and new or ongoing projects.   News Releases will be posted and archived here, so check back often to keep current with happenings at the park.      The Park's Newspapers are filled with valuable information and interesting articles written by Grand Canyon's Division of Interpretation. These valuable resources are now available for you to download and to read/print at your leisure.   Park Brochures and Site Bulletins  are available here. Grand Canyon National Park trip planning information is available for downloading in the following languages: Chinese - French - German - Italian - Japanese - Korean and Spanish. (PDF files)         Dedication of the renovated Bright Angel Trailhead on May 18, 2013 NPS photo by Michael Quinn
